widget.header: Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal

config: Case Outlines for Law Students: We are improving the usefulness of our portal for legal academia by providing descriptions of key cases in core law school courses, such as Torts, Criminal Law, Civil Procedure, Property, and Contracts. The outlines will provide links to the cases on Justia.
Products Liability Center: We are enhancing the accessibility of our content on this technical topic by adding informational boxes that highlight important points.

Onward Spotlights: We are using Onward blog posts to call attention to some of our more broadly relevant portal centers, such as DUI and Employment Law. Each post imagines how a consumer facing specific legal issues would use the content in the center to learn about the law.
